create_summary.name: create_summary
create_summary.description: Creates a summary of emails, organizing them into relevant categories for easy review.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for custom time period (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Required if time_period is 'custom'.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for custom time period (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Required if time_period is 'custom'.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: List of categories to organize emails into (e.g., ['Work', 'Personal', 'Finance']). Default categories will be used if not provided.

parameters.name: include_read
parameters.description: Whether to include already read emails in the summary (default: False)
